parameters.pythonCode:
import json
from datetime import datetime
import base64

# Get report data from previous node
report_data = items[0]['json']

# Extract key information
company_info = report_data.get('company', {})
company_name = company_info.get('name', 'Unknown Company')
ticker = company_info.get('ticker', 'N/A')
timestamp = datetime.now().strftime('%Y-%m-%d_%H-%M-%S')

# Generate filename
filename = f"mycroft_analysis_{ticker}_{timestamp}.md"

# Build Markdown report
md_lines = []

# Header
md_lines.append(f"# üéØ Mycroft AI Research Report")
md_lines.append(f"## {company_name} ({ticker})")
md_lines.append(f"**Report Date:** {datetime.now().strftime('%B %d, %Y at %H:%M UTC')}\n")
md_lines.append("---\n")

# Executive Summary
overall = report_data.get('overallAssessment', {})
recommendation = overall.get('recommendation', {})
scoring = overall.get('scoring', {})

md_lines.append("## üìä Executive Summary\n")
md_lines.append(f"- **Recommendation:** `{recommendation.get('action', 'N/A')}`")
md_lines.append(f"- **Overall Score:** {scoring.get('totalScore', 0)}/100 ({scoring.get('grade', 'N/A')})")
md_lines.append(f"- **Risk Level:** {recommendation.get('riskLevel', 'N/A')}")
md_lines.append(f"- **Confidence:** {recommendation.get('confidence', 'N/A')}")
md_lines.append(f"- **Time Horizon:** {recommendation.get('timeHorizon', 'N/A')}\n")

# Company Information
md_lines.append("## üè¢ Company Information\n")
md_lines.append(f"- **Sector:** {company_info.get('sector', 'N/A')}")
md_lines.append(f"- **Industry:** {company_info.get('industry', 'N/A')}")
md_lines.append(f"- **Exchange:** {company_info.get('exchange', 'N/A')}")
md_lines.append(f"- **Country:** {company_info.get('country', 'N/A')}")
md_lines.append(f"- **Market Cap Category:** {company_info.get('marketCapCategory', 'N/A')}\n")

if company_info.get('description'):
    md_lines.append(f"**Description:** {company_info.get('description')}\n")

# Financial Analysis
financial = report_data.get('financialAnalysis', {})
fin_overview = financial.get('overview', {})
fin_scoring = financial.get('scoring', {})

md_lines.append("## üí∞ Financial Analysis\n")
md_lines.append(f"**Financial Health Score:** {fin_scoring.get('score', 0)}/100 ({fin_scoring.get('grade', 'N/A')}) - {fin_scoring.get('percentile', 0)}th percentile\n")

md_lines.append("### Key Metrics\n")
market_cap = fin_overview.get('marketCap', {})
revenue = fin_overview.get('revenue', {})
profitability = fin_overview.get('profitability', {})
valuation = fin_overview.get('valuation', {})

md_lines.append(f"| Metric | Value |")
md_lines.append(f"|--------|-------|")
md_lines.append(f"| Market Capitalization | {market_cap.get('formatted', 'N/A')} ({market_cap.get('category', 'N/A')}) |")
md_lines.append(f"| Annual Revenue | {revenue.get('formatted', 'N/A')} |")
md_lines.append(f"| Profit Margin | {profitability.get('profitMargin', 'N/A')} |")
md_lines.append(f"| Operating Margin | {profitability.get('operatingMargin', 'N/A')} |")
md_lines.append(f"| Return on Equity | {profitability.get('returnOnEquity', 'N/A')} |")
md_lines.append(f"| Price-to-Earnings Ratio | {valuation.get('peRatio', 'N/A')} ({valuation.get('category', 'N/A')}) |\n")

# Innovation Analysis
innovation = report_data.get('innovationAnalysis', {})
inn_overview = innovation.get('overview', {})
inn_scoring = innovation.get('scoring', {})

md_lines.append("## üî¨ Innovation & R&D Analysis\n")
md_lines.append(f"**Innovation Score:** {inn_scoring.get('score', 0)}/100 ({inn_scoring.get('grade', 'N/A')}) - {inn_scoring.get('percentile', 0)}th percentile\n")

rd_investment = inn_overview.get('rdInvestment', {})
patent_portfolio = inn_overview.get('patentPortfolio', {})

md_lines.append("### Innovation Metrics\n")
md_lines.append(f"| Metric | Value |")
md_lines.append(f"|--------|-------|")
md_lines.append(f"| R&D Investment Intensity | {rd_investment.get('intensity', 'N/A')} ({rd_investment.get('category', 'N/A')}) |")
md_lines.append(f"| Total Patent Portfolio | {patent_portfolio.get('totalPatents', 'N/A')} patents |")
md_lines.append(f"| AI-Related Patents | {patent_portfolio.get('aiPatents', 'N/A')} ({patent_portfolio.get('aiRatio', 'N/A')}) |")
md_lines.append(f"| Patent Portfolio Strength | {patent_portfolio.get('strength', 'N/A')} |\n")

# Focus Areas
focus_areas = innovation.get('focusAreas', [])
if focus_areas:
    md_lines.append(f"**Innovation Focus Areas:** {', '.join(focus_areas)}\n")

# Data source
data_source = innovation.get('dataSource', 'Unknown')
search_success = innovation.get('searchSuccess', False)
md_lines.append(f"**Patent Data Source:** {data_source} {'‚úÖ (Live Search Data)' if search_success else '‚ö†Ô∏è (Estimated Data)'}\n")

# Investment Thesis
thesis = overall.get('investmentThesis', [])
if thesis:
    md_lines.append("## üìà Investment Thesis\n")
    for i, point in enumerate(thesis, 1):
        md_lines.append(f"{i}. {point}")
    md_lines.append("")

# Key Insights
insights = report_data.get('keyInsights', [])
if insights:
    md_lines.append("## üí° Key Insights\n")
    for insight in insights:
        md_lines.append(f"- {insight}")
    md_lines.append("")

# Recent Patents
patents = innovation.get('recentPatents', [])
if patents:
    md_lines.append("## üìú Recent Patent Activity\n")
    for i, patent in enumerate(patents[:5], 1):
        md_lines.append(f"### {i}. {patent.get('title', 'N/A')}\n")
        md_lines.append(f"- **Patent Number:** {patent.get('number', 'N/A')}")
        md_lines.append(f"- **Filing Date:** {patent.get('date', 'N/A')}")
        md_lines.append(f"- **AI Related:** {'Yes ‚úÖ' if patent.get('aiRelated') == 'Yes' else 'No'}")
        if patent.get('source'):
            md_lines.append(f"- **Source:** {patent.get('source')}")
        md_lines.append("")

# Risk Factors
risk_factors = report_data.get('riskFactors', {})
if risk_factors:
    md_lines.append("## ‚ö†Ô∏è Risk Factors\n")
    for risk_type, risk_desc in risk_factors.items():
        md_lines.append(f"- **{risk_type.replace('_', ' ').title()}:** {risk_desc}")
    md_lines.append("")

# Opportunity Factors
opportunity_factors = report_data.get('opportunityFactors', {})
if opportunity_factors:
    md_lines.append("## üöÄ Growth Opportunities\n")
    for opp_type, opp_desc in opportunity_factors.items():
        md_lines.append(f"- **{opp_type.replace('_', ' ').title()}:** {opp_desc}")
    md_lines.append("")

# Methodology
metadata = report_data.get('metadata', {})
tech_notes = report_data.get('technicalNotes', {})

md_lines.append("## üîß Methodology & Data Quality\n")
md_lines.append(f"- **Analysis Framework:** {metadata.get('framework', 'Mycroft Research Agent')}")
md_lines.append(f"- **Analysis Type:** {metadata.get('analysisType', 'Financial & Patent Analysis')}")
md_lines.append(f"- **Report Version:** {metadata.get('reportVersion', '3.0')}")
md_lines.append(f"- **Data Quality:** {metadata.get('dataQuality', 'High')}")
md_lines.append(f"- **Update Frequency:** {tech_notes.get('updateFrequency', 'Quarterly')}\n")

confidence_metrics = tech_notes.get('confidenceMetrics', {})
if confidence_metrics:
    md_lines.append("### Confidence Metrics\n")
    md_lines.append(f"- **Overall Confidence:** {confidence_metrics.get('overallConfidence', 'N/A')}")
    md_lines.append(f"- **Data Completeness:** {confidence_metrics.get('dataCompleteness', 'N/A')}")
    md_lines.append(f"- **Analysis Depth:** {confidence_metrics.get('analysisDepth', 'N/A')}\n")

# Limitations
limitations = tech_notes.get('limitations', [])
if limitations:
    md_lines.append("### Analysis Limitations\n")
    for limitation in limitations:
        md_lines.append(f"- {limitation}")
    md_lines.append("")

# Footer
md_lines.append("---\n")
md_lines.append("**Generated by Mycroft Research Agent**")
md_lines.append("*AI-Powered Investment Intelligence Framework*")
md_lines.append("‚ö†Ô∏è *Educational Research Tool - Not Financial Advice*\n")

# Join all lines
markdown_content = "\n".join(md_lines)

# Encode to base64 for n8n binary data
content_bytes = markdown_content.encode('utf-8')
base64_content = base64.b64encode(content_bytes).decode('utf-8')

# Return with proper n8n binary format
return [{
    'json': {
        'filename': filename,
        'company': company_name,
        'ticker': ticker,
        'recommendation': recommendation.get('action', 'N/A'),
        'score': scoring.get('totalScore', 0),
        'timestamp': timestamp,
        'size': len(markdown_content),
        'content_preview': markdown_content[:200] + '...'
    },
    'binary': {
        'data': {
            'data': base64_content,
            'mimeType': 'text/markdown',
            'fileName': filename,
            'fileExtension': 'md'
        }
    }
}]
